+-- Weather Module Database Schema
+-- This schema supports weather configuration and data storage
+
+-- Weather configuration table
+CREATE TABLE weather_config (
+    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
+    api_service VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'openweathermap',
+    api_key VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
+    location_method ENUM('zip', 'coordinates', 'city') DEFAULT 'zip',
+    location_value VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
+    country_code VARCHAR(2) DEFAULT 'US',
+    update_interval INT DEFAULT 30,
+    temperature_units ENUM('metric', 'imperial', 'kelvin') DEFAULT 'metric',
+    language VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'en',
+    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
+    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
+);
+
+-- Weather data cache table
+CREATE TABLE weather_data (
+    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
+    config_id INT NOT NULL,
+    data_type ENUM('current', 'forecast') NOT NULL,
+    temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
+    feels_like DECIMAL(5,2),
+    humidity INT,
+    pressure DECIMAL(7,2),
+    wind_speed DECIMAL(5,2),
+    wind_direction INT,
+    wind_gust DECIMAL(5,2),
+    visibility DECIMAL(5,2),
+    uv_index DECIMAL(3,1),
+    condition_main VARCHAR(50),
+    condition_description VARCHAR(100),
+    weather_icon VARCHAR(10),
+    cloudiness INT,
+    precipitation DECIMAL(5,2),
+    forecast_date DATE NULL,
+    forecast_time TIME NULL,
+    sunrise TIME NULL,
+    sunset TIME NULL,
+    location_name VARCHAR(100),
+    raw_data JSON,
+    retrieved_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+    FOREIGN KEY (config_id) REFERENCES weather_config(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
+    INDEX idx_config_type (config_id, data_type),
+    INDEX idx_forecast_date (forecast_date),
+    INDEX idx_retrieved_at (retrieved_at)
+);
+
+-- Weather API providers reference table
+CREATE TABLE weather_providers (
+    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
+    provider_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
+    api_base_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
+    requires_api_key BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
+    supports_current BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
+    supports_forecast BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
+    supports_historical BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
+    rate_limit_per_minute INT DEFAULT 60,
+    rate_limit_per_day INT DEFAULT 1000,
+    documentation_url VARCHAR(255),
+    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
+    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
+);
+
+-- Insert default weather providers
+INSERT INTO weather_providers (provider_name, api_base_url, requires_api_key, supports_current, supports_forecast, rate_limit_per_minute, rate_limit_per_day, documentation_url) VALUES
+('openweathermap', 'https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5', TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, 60, 1000, 'https://openweathermap.org/api'),
+('weatherapi', 'https://api.weatherapi.com/v1', TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, 100, 1000000, 'https://www.weatherapi.com/docs/'),
+('accuweather', 'https://dataservice.accuweather.com', TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, 50, 50, 'https://developer.accuweather.com/apis');
+
+-- Weather alerts table (for future use)
+CREATE TABLE weather_alerts (
+    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
+    config_id INT NOT NULL,
+    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
+    severity ENUM('minor', 'moderate', 'severe', 'extreme'),
+    title VARCHAR(255),
+    description TEXT,
+    start_time TIMESTAMP,
+    end_time TIMESTAMP,
+    areas TEXT,
+    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
+    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+    FOREIGN KEY (config_id) REFERENCES weather_config(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
+);
+
+-- Weather API usage tracking
+CREATE TABLE weather_api_usage (
+    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
+    config_id INT NOT NULL,
+    provider_name VARCHAR(50),
+    api_calls_count INT DEFAULT 1,
+    usage_date DATE,
+    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+    FOREIGN KEY (config_id) REFERENCES weather_config(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
+    UNIQUE KEY unique_daily_usage (config_id, provider_name, usage_date)
+);
